Tomás Premoli

Software Engineer - ML

Resume

About Me

Hey everyone! I'm Tomás Premoli, a Computer Science Master's student at the University of Exeter, fascinated by the field of Deep Learning. I'm interested in how Deep Learning can push boundaries and create innovative solutions across essential fields.

With my academic work delving into Convolutional Neural Networks and Latent Diffusion Models, I have developed a passion in Machine Learning and Deep Learning as a whole. I'm eager to see how Deep Learning can revolutionize different industries and applications.

I'm a bilingual communicator with excellent written and verbal skills. I believe collaboration is key to tackling challenging problems, and I thrive in team environments.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me immersed in the world of music. I love listening to new albums and artists, and dabble in music production myself!

Experience

Amazon

Software Development Engineer Intern - June 2023 - September 2023

Formed a part of the RME org, migrating a large portion of data engineering cloud infrastructure to the AWS CDK.

  • Enabled CI/CD
  • Enhanced development experience for essential big data management workflows.
  • Furthered ML skills by taking Machine Learning University (MLU) trainings in NLP (RNNs, LTSMs, Transformers) and CV (CNNs, GANs).
  • Developed skills in data-oriented cloud infrastructure and setting up DevOps workflows.
  • Furthered data engineering skillset, and gained experience in AWS Lambda, Glue, EMR, and IAM.
c# xamarin asp.net core .net core azure devops

Amazon

Software Development Engineer Intern - June 2022 - September 2022

Formed a part of the Search M5 team, focused on training and deploying large scale foundation models to hundreds of teams across Amazon.

  • Created an NLP model training pipeline, used to train, finetune, distill, and evaluate Transformer-based ML models.
  • Automated the training of multi-modal models containing over 200 million parameters each.
  • Created tools for hot-wapping configuration files and creating novel workflows.
  • Gained experience using Apache Airflow, AWS EC2, and AWS Batch.
c# xamarin asp.net core .net core azure devops

Education / Training

University of Exeter

MSci Computer Science - September 2020 - September 2024

Computer Science integrated master's at the University of Exeter
  • Grade Avgs: Year 1: 78, Year 2: 77, Year 3: 74
  • Computer Science Subject Chair 2021/2022, leading SSLC (Staff-student Liaison Committee) meetings on behalf of the student's guild to represent computer science students for the university
  • MSci Dissertation: Latent Diffusion Models for Effective, Class-Conditional Dataset Augmentation
  • BSc Dissertation: A Comparison of Convolutional Neural Network Architectures for the Classification of Alzheimer’s Disease Patients Using MRI Scans.

American School of Barcelona

International Baccalaureate Diploma - September 2018 - September 2020

  • Grade: 6/7 in Higher Level Mathematics, 7/7 in Computer Science.
  • Wide receiver for the flag football team; 🏆 Second Place Catalunya Flag Football Open 2019
  • Admin at BCNMUN 2019
  • Medical translator at the TUMI medical mission 2016 & 2017
